cscie160.hw2
Class Elevator

java.lang.Object
  cscie160.hw2.Elevator

public class Elevator
extends java.lang.Object

Elevator Class will simulate the realworld Elevator system. It has implementation to drop the passengers to their destined floors upon request.

Since:
- 10/08/2012
Version:
2.0
Author:
KALPAN

Constructor Detail

Elevator

public Elevator()
No argument constructor. It will construct an Elevator at the first floor with no passangers on board and direction set to UP

Method Detail

move

public void move()
This method will move the elevator UP/DOWN each floor. If any passengers, destined for perticular floor or if passengers are waiting on floor,It will call stop Method.

stop

public void stop()
This method will stop the Elevator at current floor. It will decrease total no of passengers on board and will call unloadPassenger method to unload passengers from elevator to the floor. Then Prints the status of the Elevator and current Floor

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
This Overridden method will print the status of the Elevator object. It will display its current floor, its moving direction and total Passengers on board.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object

boardPassengers

public void boardPassengers(int... v)
                     throws ElevatorFullException
This method will board the passengers to the elevator, by passing the requested destination floor in the argument for each passenger. If elevator is at its full capacity it throws an exception

Parameters:
v - destination floor - Separate the values by comma for each passenger
Throws:
ElevatorFullException - - When Elevator reaches its max cap it throws this exception

registerRequest

public void registerRequest()
This method registers request to the elevator to stop at perticulat floor to board waiting passengers from the floor. Whenever this method is called it checks each floor for any waiting passengers and registers a request accordigly

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Executing this main method will create an Elevator object at 1st floor and array of Floor objects. Take all the passengers from 1st floor. Move up goingthrough each floor and then comes down. It will continue untill all the passengers are released at their requsted destination.
